results.text: እነሆ የአይከት ሰዎችም በእርግጥ በዳዮች ነበሩ፤
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ከነሱም ተበቀልን ሁለቱም (የሉጥና የአይከት ሕዝቦች ከተሞች) በእርግጥ በግልጽ መንገድ ላይ ናቸው፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ከኮረብታዎችም ቤቶችን ጸጥተኞች ኾነው ይጠርቡ ነበር፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
